column10: Driver ran red light as I was crossing Edsall Rd

column10: Driver turned without signaling into the crosswalk while people were in it crossing with a Walk sign

Pedestrian crossing from median across turn lanes and main lanes. Light for cars was green so speeds were up, it was dark, and cars had to break suddenly to avoid pedestrian.  There is a high number of pedestrians in the area (Edsall intersection,  both north and south of light) crossing not at crosswalks.
